commit.message:
* pa.c (emit_move_sequence): If in reload, call find_replacement.

files.patch:

+	* pa.c (emit_move_sequence): If in reload, call find_replacement.

 	* Makefile.in (gcov$(exeext)): Support .exe extension to gcov.
